attributes.action: Trees down on jossey lane doncaster scawthorpe
attributes.additional_details: The trees on jossey lane are overgrown and cannot see when traffic going up and down jossey lane when pulling out of the drive also sapp going on the car and ruins them .. they neeed to be removed!!!

rejection.details: Please contact your local authority to help with your request.  This is not an issue that central government can assist with.
